thread.title: Numericable-SFR to Move Money to Parent Altice Via €2.5 Billion Dividend
thread.title_full: Numericable-SFR to Move Money to Parent Altice Via €2.5 Billion Dividend - WSJ

author: Nick Kostov
title: Numericable-SFR to Move Money to Parent Altice Via €2.5 Billion Dividend
text:
Numericable-SFR, the French mobile and cable operator majority owned by billionaire Patrick Drahi, plans to transfer money to parent company Altice SA by paying a €2.5 billion dividend.
SFR-Numericable announced the move in a statement late Wednesday that said it would fund the dividend by borrowing at least €1.6 billion as well as using... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
